entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Showers. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning. Showers beginning in the afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm late in the afternoon. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 60. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Showers. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Showers. Risk of a thunderstorm early in the evening. Local amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Wednesday 19 April 2023
